title: New account, hex key fragments not dropping but crates yes
body:
Now i know the loot system has been changed a lot and i was out of league for a while like 1 season or half idk how long it was, but yea i made myself a new account leveling it up, and i got slotta boxes from S+ games, but no key fragments for idk how many games account is lvl 9 now, thats at least like 20 or 25.....

¯\_(ツ)_/¯

replies.body: Those [**key fragments**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233) are meant to spread evenly out over the course of about a month, and they pop up anytime after playing games or when you're on the client.
